"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "na morosoma ɔbɔfo ma oeedzi w'enyim; na metu Keenannyi
Si mu: Amorinyi

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "kɔ asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do: na mirinndzi wo mu nnkɔ; osiandɛ ɔman akɔnkyefo nye wo: bɛyɛ na mahyew wo wɔ ɔkwan no mu."
"Na aber a ɔman no tsee nsɛm bɔn yi no
Si mu: wogyamee: na obiara annhyɛ n'ahyehyɛdze."
Se Israelmba no dɛ
fi ha kɔ: Ɔman akɔnkyefo nye hom: sɛ miridzi wo mu mber kakraabi menye wo akɔ a
ɔwo nye ɔman a edze hɔn fi Egypt asaase: nkyɛ mebɛhyew wo: dɛm ntsi afei yiyi w'ahyehyɛdze no wɔ wo ho
kɔ asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Abraha: ma munhu dza medze bɛyɛ wo."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na Israelmba no yiyii hɔn ho ahyehyɛdze no fi bepɔw Horeb ho araa dze kɔ no."
"Afei Moses ɔtɔ dɛ ɔfa buw no na ɔdze kesi nseraban no ekyir
Si mu: ekyirekyir fi nseraban no ho; na ɔfrɛɛ no Ehyiadzibuw. Na ɔbaa dɛ obiara a ɔrohwehwɛ EWURADZE no fir edzi kɔ ehyiadzibuw no a ɔwɔ nseraban no ekyir no ho."
aber a Moses fiir edzi rokɔ Buw no ho no
kɔ asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Abraha: nyimpa biara wɔ no buw abowano
Isaak: na wɔhwɛɛ Moses n'etsikɔ araa kodur dɛ ɔkɛhɛɛn Buw no mu."

Si mu: aber a Moses kɛhɛɛn Buw no mu no
ɔwo nye ɔman a edze hɔn fi Egypt asaase: na obegyinaa Buw no n'abowano: na EWURADZE nye Moses kasae."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ɔman no nyinara hun mununkum dum no dɛ ogyina Buw no n'abowano: na ɔman no nyinara soɛrsoɛree na wɔkotokotowee
Si mu: nyimpa biara wɔ no buw abowano."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses enyim nye enyim
Si mu: dɛ nyimpa rekasa kyerɛ ne nyɛnko. Na ɔsanee baa nseraban no mu: mbom no somfo Josua
Hwɛ
ɔwo nye ɔman a edze hɔn fi Egypt asaase: Fa ɔman yi kɔ: na emmaa munnhun nyia ebɔsoma no ma ɔnye me aakɔ. Naaso aka dɛ

Si mu: mepa wo kyɛw
Isaak: ma meenya w'enyim enyimnyam: na hwɛ ɔman yi dɛ ɔyɛ wo man."

Si mu: Mara ankasa bedzi w'enyim nye wo akɔ
Sɛ warankasa nnye hɛn annkɔ dze a
fi ha kɔ: ɔno mma mmfa hɛn mfi ha nnkɔ."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ebɛnadze mu na wɔdze bohu dɛ menya w'enyim enyimnyam
Si mu: emi nye wo man? Ana nnyɛ kɔ a enye hɛn bɔkɔ no mu bi a
kɔ asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Abraha: wɔ amanaman a wɔwɔ asaase enyi nyinara mu bi a?"

Si mu: Dza aka yi so mebɛyɛ: osiandɛ enya m'enyim enyimnyam
fi ha kɔ: na medze wo dzin minyim wo."

Si mu: Mepa wo kyɛw
Mebɛma me yie nyinara etwa mu wɔ w'enyim
fi ha kɔ: na mapaa EWURADZE ne dzin wɔ w'enyim
kɔ asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Abraha: na mehu nyia mubohu no mbɔbɔr

Si mu: Innkotum ahwɛ m'enyim: osiandɛ nyimpa nnkɔhwɛ me na ɔatsena ase."
Hwɛ

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ m'enyimnyam no rutwa mu a
Si mu: medze wo bɛhyɛ ɔbotan no ne mpaae bi mu
fi ha kɔ: na medze me nsa akata wo do ma meetwa mu ansaana:"

Si mu: ma ehu m'ekyir: naaso m'enyim dze
